info.title: Weather Forecast APIs - SkyAPI Inc.
info.description: Reference design documentation of Weather Forecast APIs based on the OpenAPI 3.0 specification. Created by Rohit Parida

tags.name: Location
tags.description: APIs for location management (cities and regions in the world). Used for administrative purposes.

/v1/locations.summary: Operations for managing cities and regions around the world (location)
/v1/locations.description: Clients use these APIs to manage locations available for weather forecast

get.summary: Returns a list of managed locations - available for weather forecast
get.description: Clients use this API to get a list of managed locations. Each location is uniquely identified by location code, for example 'LACA_US' represents Los Angeles city in California state, in the United States of America (US)

200.description: successful operation. There are managed locations available.

post.summary: Adds a new location to be managed for weather forecast
post.description: Clients use this API to put a new location into the system. Location code must be manually specified. Country code and country name based on ISO 3166

requestBody.description: a JSON object that represents a location

region_name.description: name of the region, state or province

country_code.description: 2 characters representing country code based on ISO 3166 standard

country_name.description: name of the country based on ISO 3166 standard

enabled.description: whether the location enabled (true) or disabled (false)

201.description: Successful add operation. Location added. Returns details of the newly added location.

region_name.description: name of the region, state or province

country_code.description: 2 characters representing country code based on ISO 3166 standard

country_name.description: name of the country based on ISO 3166 standard

enabled.description: whether the location enabled (true) or disabled (false)

400.description: Failed add operation. Request body rejected due to some fields have invalid values

put.description: Clients use this API to modify information of a specific location. Note that location code cannot be changed.

requestBody.description: a JSON object that represents the location information that needs to be updated

region_name.description: name of the region, state or province

country_code.description: 2 characters representing country code based on ISO 3166 standard

country_name.description: name of the country based on ISO 3166 standard

enabled.description: whether the location enabled (true) or disabled (false)

200.description: Successful update operation. Location updated. Returns details of the recently updated location

region_name.description: name of the region, state or province

country_code.description: 2 characters representing country code based on ISO 3166 standard

country_name.description: name of the country based on ISO 3166 standard

enabled.description: whether the location enabled (true) or disabled (false)

400.description: Failed update operation. Request body rejected due to some fields have invalid values

404.description: No location found with the given location_code.

/v1/locations/{code}.summary: Operations for managing a specific location identified by location location_code

get.description: Clients use this API to find an existing location in the database by a specific location_code

region_name.description: name of the region, state or province

country_code.description: 2 characters representing country code based on ISO 3166 standard

country_name.description: name of the country based on ISO 3166 standard

enabled.description: whether the location enabled (true) or disabled (false)

404.description: No location found with the given code.

delete.summary: Removes an existing location found by a specific code
delete.description: Clients use this API to delete a specific location from database

404.description: No location found with the given code.

/v1/realtime.summary: Operation for accessing realtime weather data based on client's IP address

get.summary: Returns the current weather information of the location based on client's IP address
get.description: Clients use this API to get real time weather data of client's location (based on IP address)

200.description: successful retrieval operation. Realtime data available for the client's location

location.description: name of location, in form of "city name, state/region name, country name"
location.example: New York City, New York, United States of America

temperature.description: current temperature of the location, default in Celsius degree

wind_speed.description: current wind speed (default unit is km/h)

last_updated.description: the last time weather data is updated

realtimeWeatherExample.value:
{
"location": "San Francisco, California, United States of America",
"temperature": 12,
"humidity": 32,
"precipitation": 88,
"status": "Cloudy",
"win_speed": 5,
"last_updated": "2023-02-02 19:23:00"
}

400.description: bad request. Could not determine client's IP address

404.description: No managed location found for the client's IP address

temperature.description: current temperature of the location, default in Celsius degree

wind_speed.description: current wind speed (default unit is km/h)

last_updated.description: the last time weather data is updated

/v1/hourly.summary: Operation for accessing hourly weather forecast based on client's IP address
/v1/hourly.description: Clients use this API to get hourly forecast information for today

get.summary: Returns weather forecast for upcoming hours in the current day, based on client's IP address
get.description: Clients use this API to get weather forecast for upcoming hours in the current day. Location is determined automatically based on client's IP address.

200.description: successful retrieval operation. A JSON object representing hourly forecast information available for the client's location

location.description: name of location, in form of "city name, state/region name, country name"

temperature.description: forecasted temperature at the hour, default in Celcius degree

400.description: bad request. Could not determine client's IP address

404.description: No managed location found for the client's IP address
